meanings.definition: A person or thing that reveals something.
meanings.sent1: The detective was the revealers of the hidden clue.
meanings.sent2: The revealers of the treasure map led us to the buried chest.
meanings.sent3: The parrot became an unexpected revealers when it mimicked the secret code.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes were like revealers, uncovering the truth behind his words.
meanings.sent5: The revealers in the story turned out to be the talking mirror.

meanings.sent1: The revealers gathered to share their findings from the ancient ruins.
meanings.sent2: We thanked the revealers for shedding light on the mysterious manuscript.
meanings.sent3: The revealers' meeting turned into a lively discussion about their discoveries.
meanings.sent4: The stars in the night sky acted as revealers of the upcoming storm.
meanings.sent5: The revealers' identities remained hidden behind their masks during the ceremony.
